sentences.en: Accreditation and adoption processes should give preference to open educational resources.
sentences.cn: 认证和采纳过程应当给予开放教育资源优先权.

sentences.en: Accreditation is also hampered by several other factors.
sentences.cn: 鉴别材料还受到一些别的妨碍.

sentences.en: Can I have a look at your Accreditation Card, please ?
sentences.cn: 我能看看您的身份证注册卡 吗 ?

sentences.en: How can you tell if a school has accreditation or not?
sentences.cn: 那么,你又如何知道一所学校是不是受到认证了 呢 ?

sentences.en: Implementation, vendor accreditation, customer relationship management, etc.
sentences.cn: 的实施 、 供应商评审 、 客户关系管理等.

sentences.en: It has passed the accreditation of ISO 9001:2000 International Quality Management System.
sentences.cn: 已通过认证的ISO9001:2000国际质量管理体系.

sentences.en: Mislead a reader about AFAQ - EAQA accreditation status or scope.
sentences.cn: 误导AFAQ-EAQA的认可状况和范围.

sentences.en: Non Public Areas, within the Venue, Including the Broadcast Compound, requiring accreditation for access.
sentences.cn: 场馆内的不对公众开放的区域, 包含了转播综合区, 需凭特定的大会证件进入.

sentences.en: Note: this form is for personal interview only, not for media accreditation.
sentences.cn: 注意: 此表用于个人采访申请, 火炬接力报名不需提交.

sentences.en: One accrediting agency is the Coucile for the higher education accreditation.
sentences.cn: 高等教育认证委员会就是认证机构其它之一.

sentences.en: Sure thing. Could I have a look at your Accreditation Card, please ?
sentences.cn: 当然可以. 我能看看您的身份注册卡 吗 ?

sentences.en: The quality level of accreditation, expansion of successful completion of acceptance.
sentences.cn: 工程质量评定为合格等级, 扩建工程顺利通过竣工验收.

sentences.en: They realise that this [ international accreditation ] will help them compete.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到这 ( 国际认证 ) 有助于竞争.

sentences.en: This form of accreditation is more sensitive to site specific conditions.
sentences.cn: 这种认证形式对特定条件的确定更加准确.

sentences.en: You know how much WHO accreditation means to the hospital?
sentences.cn: 知道世界卫生组织的鉴定对医院多重要 吗 ?
